recipe.title: Chocolate Chip Granola Bites Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup ; nut butter, of your preference ; (120 g)

steps.step: Mix together oats, cinnamon, vanilla extract, nut butter, honey, and chocolate chips in a medium bowl until well-incorporated.
Cover with plastic wrap and chill in the refrigerator for an hour.
Roll into balls the size of a ping pong ball.
Refrigerate in tightly sealed container for up to one week.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Mix together oats, cinnamon, vanilla extract, nut butter, honey, and chocolate chips in a medium bowl until well-incorporated.
Cover with plastic wrap and chill in the refrigerator for an hour.
Roll into balls the size of a ping pong ball.
Refrigerate in tightly sealed container for up to one week.
